branchCategory.name: AFF70~90D, Main Line Filter
branchCategory.description: <p>The new AFF70~90D improves upon the performance of the classic AFF with a 1 &mu;m particulate rating and increased water removal capabilities.  Additionally, flow capacities are improved over the current models.  Installation space is saved by integrating the traditional AFF filtering function with the water removal of the AMG.  A lightweight stainless bowl assembly saves improves handling and simplifies service.</p>
